price: (30) And the Messenger has said, "O my Lord, indeed my people have taken this Qur’ān as [a thing] abandoned."[1022]
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلرَّسُولُ يَٰرَبِّ إِنَّ قَوۡمِي ٱتَّخَذُواْ هَٰذَا ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ مَهۡجُورٗا
footnotes: [1022]- i.e., avoiding it, not listening to or understanding it, not living by it, or preferring something else to it.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waqāla al-rasūlu yārabbi inna qawmī ittakhadhū hādhā al-qur'āna mahjūran
